definition: To produce or create something, typically referring to the act of making or manufacturing a tangible object. This word is commonly used in the context of crafting, constructing, or assembling various items.

examples.german: Ich fertige eine Torte für die Party.
examples.english: I am making a cake for the party.

examples.german: Sie fertigen hochwertige Uhren in Handarbeit.
examples.english: They manufacture high-quality watches by hand.

examples.german: Die Fabrik fertigt täglich tausende Produkte.
examples.english: The factory produces thousands of products daily.

examples.german: Er fertigte eine Kopie des Gemäldes.
examples.english: He made a copy of the painting.
